  • Uses of MetadataSummary in org.apache.sis.gui.metadata

    Constructors in org.apache.sis.gui.metadata with parameters of type MetadataSummary
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    MetadataTree(MetadataSummary controller)
    Creates a new initially empty metadata tree which will be automatically updated when the given widget is given a DataStore.
     
    StandardMetadataTree(MetadataSummary controller)
    Creates a new initially empty metadata tree which will be automatically updated when the given widget shows new metadata.
